pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools to create, run your Deadlock challenges.## Help```bashdcli --help```[Documentation about challenges.](https://deadlock-resources.github.io/challenge-documentation)## Install from pip```bashpip install deadlock-cli --user```If it does not work make sure you have your PATH correctly set: `export PATH=$PATH:/home/$USER/.local/bin`## Install from sources```bashgit clone https://github.com/deadlock-resources/dcli.gitcd dcli/pip3 install .```## Get dcli version```bashdcli version```## Generate mission```bashdcli gen (java|python|cpp|c|kotlin)```## Execute mission```bashdcli solve ./mission_pathdcli run ./mission_path```## Execute metamorph missionTo execute your multi language mission:```bash# running the Java codedcli solve . javadcli run . java# running the Python codedcli solve . pythondcli run . python```## Use verbose modeIf you want more information when you launch the containers you can use the verbose mode with the flag `--verbose`. It also allows you to have more detail on some errors.```bash# running code with verbose modedcli run . --verbosedcli solve . --verbose```## Todo* Add Haskell generator language## Build archive from sources```bashpython setup.py sdist```
